001package net.tvburger.jdl.knn;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.model.DataSet;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.model.EstimationFunction;
005import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.ObjectiveFunction;
006import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.Optimizer;
007import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.Regime;
008
009public class NearestNeighborsPreparer implements Regime {
010
011    @Override
012    public <E extends EstimationFunction> void train(E estimationFunction, DataSet trainingSet, ObjectiveFunction objective, Optimizer<? super E> optimizer) {
013        if (!(estimationFunction instanceof NearestNeighbors nearestNeighbors)) {
014            throw new IllegalArgumentException("Only works on NearestNeighbors!");
015        }
016        nearestNeighbors.setMemory(trainingSet);
017    }
018}
